verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> about in the same<WH1931> year,<WH8141> in the beginning<WH7225> of the reign<WH4467> of Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> in the fourth<WH7243> year,<WH8141> in the fifth<WH2549> month,<WH2320> that Hananiah<WH2608> the son<WH1121> of Azzur,<WH5809> the prophet,<WH5030> who<WH834> was from Gibeon,<WH1391> spoke<WH559> to me in the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> in the presence<WH5869> of the priests<WH3548> and all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559>
"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> 'I have broken<WH7665> the yoke<WH5923> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon.<WH894>

'Within<WH5750> two<WH8145> years<WH8141> I am going to bring<WH7725> back<WH7725> to this<WH2088> place<WH4725> all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> of the Lord's house,<WH1004> which<WH834> Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> took<WH3947> away<WH3947> from this<WH2088> place<WH4725> and carried<WH935> to Babylon.<WH894>

'I am also going to bring<WH7725> back<WH7725> to this<WH2088> place<WH4725> Jeconiah<WH3204> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiakim,<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and all<WH3605> the exiles<WH1546> of Judah<WH3063> who went<WH935> to Babylon,<WH894>' declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> 'for I will break<WH7665> the yoke<WH5923> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon.<WH894>' "

Then the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> spoke<WH559> to the prophet<WH5030> Hananiah<WH2608> in the presence<WH5869> of the priests<WH3548> and in the presence<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> who were standing<WH5975> in the house<WH1004> of the Lord,<WH3068>

and the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> said,<WH559> "Amen!<WH543> May the Lord<WH3068> do<WH6213> so;<WH3651> may the Lord<WH3068> confirm<WH6965> your words<WH1697> which<WH834> you have prophesied<WH5012> to bring<WH7725> back<WH7725> the vessels<WH3627> of the Lord's house<WH1004> and all<WH3605> the exiles,<WH1473> from Babylon<WH894> to this<WH2088> place.<WH4725>
"Yet<WH389> hear<WH8085> now<WH4994> this<WH2088> word<WH1697> which<WH834> I am about to speak<WH1696> in your hearing<WH241> and in the hearing<WH241> of all<WH3605> the people!<WH5971>

"The prophets<WH5030> who<WH834> were before<WH6440> me and before<WH6440> you from ancient<WH5769> times<WH5769> prophesied<WH5012> against<WH413> many<WH7227> lands<WH776> and against<WH5921> great<WH1419> kingdoms,<WH4467> of war<WH4421> and of calamity<WH9567> and of pestilence.<WH1698>

"The prophet<WH5030> who<WH834> prophesies<WH5012> of peace,<WH7965> when the word<WH1697> of the prophet<WH5030> shall come<WH935> to pass,<WH935> then that prophet<WH5030> will be known<WH3045> [as] one whom<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> has truly<WH571> sent.<WH7971>"
Then Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030> took<WH3947> the yoke<WH4133> from the neck<WH6677> of Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> and broke<WH7665> it.

And Hananiah<WH2608> spoke<WH559> in the presence<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> "Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> 'Even<WH3602> so<WH3602> will I break<WH7665> within<WH5750> two<WH8145> full<WH3117> years,<WH8141> the yoke<WH5923> of Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> from the neck<WH6677> of all<WH3605> the nations.<WH1471>'" Then the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> went<WH1980> his way.<WH1870>

And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah,<WH3414> after<WH310> Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030> had broken<WH7665> the yoke<WH4133> from off<WH5921> the neck<WH6677> of the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

"Go<WH1980> and speak<WH559> to Hananiah,<WH2608> saying,<WH559> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> "You have broken<WH7665> the yokes<WH4133> of wood,<WH6086> but you have made<WH6213> instead<WH8478> of them yokes<WH4133> of iron.<WH1270> "

'For thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> "I have put<WH5414> a yoke<WH5923> of iron<WH1270> on the neck<WH6677> of all<WH3605> these<WH428> nations,<WH1471> that they may serve<WH5647> Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon;<WH894> and they shall serve<WH5647> him. And I have also<WH1571> given<WH5414> him the beasts<WH9130> of the field.<WH7704>"' "

Then Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> said<WH559> to Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet,<WH5030> "Listen<WH8085> now,<WH4994> Hananiah,<WH2608> the Lord<WH3068> has not sent<WH7971> you, and you have made this<WH2088> people<WH5971> trust<WH982> in a lie.<WH8267>

"Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> 'Behold,<WH2009> I am about to remove<WH7971> you from the face<WH6440> of the earth.<WH127> This year<WH8141> you are going to die,<WH4191> because<WH3588> you have counseled<WH1696> rebellion<WH5627> against<WH413> the Lord.<WH3068>'"
So Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030> died<WH4191> in the same<WH1931> year<WH8141> in the seventh<WH7637> month.<WH2320>
